Sponsors

  1. OSGeo Korean Chapter – Supporters
  2. Dr. Jiyoon Kim – Supporters
  3. OSGeo Japan Chapter – Silver Sponsors
  4. University of Moratuwa – Silver Sponsors
  5. Geoinformatic International – Media partners
  6. Sri Lanka Telecom – Internet/Wi-Fi and Network Provider
  7. Beijing Homcom Technology Co., Ltd – Silver Sponsors
  8. NextTech Group – Supporters
  9. OSGeo India – Supporters
  10. Systrasola – Silver Sponsors

Official Airline Partner of FOSS4G-ASIA 2018

SriLankan Airlines – Launched in 1979, Sri Lanka`s National Carrier is an award winning airline with a solid reputation for service, comfort, safety, reliability and punctuality. University of Moratuwa is pleased to announce you that as the official airline of the FOSS4G-Asia 2018, Sri Lankan Airlines would offer all participants and accompanying persons a 15 % discount on economy class airfare and a 10% discount on business class airfare (on the prevailing market fare at the time of ticketing) for purchase of tickets for registered delegates travelling to Sri Lanka from our online stations.

Online Stations

  • Indian Sub-Continent: Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, Cochin, Bangalore, Trichy, Trivandrum, Madurai, Kolkata, Hyderabad, Visakhapatnam, Coimbatore, Pakistan, Maldives, Seychelles, Bangladesh
  • Far East: Singapore, Beijing, Hong Kong, Kuala Lumpur, Bangkok, Shanghai, Canton, Tokyo, Indonesia, Melbourne
  • Middle East: Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Riyadh, Dammam, Jeddah, Doha, Kuwait ,Muscat, Bahrain
  • Europe: London

Please note that to avail of these discounts, ticketing will have to be done directly at our UL offices and not through agents and proof of registration will be needed (a letter confirming participation by the local event-organising body will suffice).

(All related taxes must be paid for separately and are not discountable)

You may find all contact details of our offices on our corporate website: Contact Us

Call for Sponsors

The conference committee of FOSS4G ASIA requests sponsorship from companies, organizations and research institutes who see the value in Geospatial technologies and are keen in both adoption and use of these in various fields.

PLATINUM : Minimum contribution USD 8,000

The opportunity to be a Platinum Sponsor is limited to a few, and so early confirmation is appreciated. In recognition of their generosity, they will receive following benefits

  • Maximum number of Platinum Sponsors is restricted to 2.
  • Display of the Sponsor logo linked to URL on Conference Website and other promotion materials.
  • Free registration for 10 persons belonging to sponsor organization.
  • One page free advertisement (color) in Conference Proceedings.
  • Free 1sqm Exhibition booth space.

 

GOLD: Minimum contribution USD 4,000

Gold sponsors receives the following benefits:

  • Maximum number of Gold Sponsors is restricted to 4.
  • Display of the Sponsor logo linked to URL on Conference Website and other promotion materials.
  • Free registration for 5 persons belonging to sponsor organization.
  • One page free advertisement (color) in Conference Proceedings.
  • 50% discount for Exhibition booth (250 USD per square meter).

 

SILVER: Minimum contribution USD 2,000

Silver sponsors receives the following benefits:

  • Maximum number of Silver Sponsors is restricted to 6.
  • Display of the Sponsor logo linked to URL on Conference Website and other promotion materials.
  • Free registration for 3 persons belonging to sponsor organization.
  • Half page free advertisement (color) in Conference Proceedings.
  • 25% discount for Exhibition booth (125 USD per square meter)

 

SUPPORTER: Minimum contribution USD 1,000

Supporter sponsors receives the following benefits:

  • Maximum number of Supporters is not restricted.
  • Display of the Sponsor logo linked to URL on Conference Website and other promotion materials
  • Free registration for 1 persons belonging to the sponsor organization.

 

Sponsorship Opportunities Plan Flyer: Download.
